name: Topo Mole (Karoline Jimenez, elbiguel)
description:
Topo Mole is an strategy game, cards and memory where you must help a mole to travel underground and to avoid the roots and the enemies using only a limited number of moves that a deck of cards will allow you.
 
Credits: 

Diego Johnson (Elbiguel)- Programmer
Karoline Jimenez (KiuJ) - Artist
Diego Fernández (Humeante)- Programmer
Andrés Aranda (euqrs)- Music
Mar Escalante (Queenwarrior)- Narrative
Christopher Vargas (Chrivart) - Artist
